name: BoyAndLabyrinth
description:
[boy and Labyrinth] is a game of finding the maze of pixel graphics.
Help the boy escape the maze safely.

Random Maze

At the beginning of the stage, a maze is created to provide different maps each time.

Various Mode

Break through maze with different goals, boss, trap, survival, and run mode.

Stroy

Find clues so the boy can know the maze and what happened in the world.
